stripped_text: 2 credits: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. Subroutine Gain 2 credits. Subroutine Trash 1 installed program.
text:
2[credit]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability.
[subroutine] Gain 2[credit].
[subroutine] Trash 1 installed program.
title: Negotiator
